description.p: Run Windows software on Linux with Bottles!
Bottle software and enjoy at your leisure!

Our built-in dependency installation system grants automatic software compatibility access. Use the download manager to download the official components: the runner (Wine, Proton), DXVK, dependencies, etc.
Bottle versioning keeps your work safe now and lets you restore it later!
Features:

ul.li: Create bottles using preconfigured environments or create your own
Run executables (.exe/.msi) in your bottles, directly from the context menu of your file-manager
Automated detection of applications installed in your bottles
Add environment variables quickly
Override DLLs directly from per-bottle preferences
On-the-fly runner change for any Bottle
Various gaming-performance optimizations (esync, fsync, DXVK, cache, shader compiler, offload â€¦ and much more.)
Automatic installation and management of Wine and Proton runners
Automatic bottle repair in case of breakage
Integrated dependency-installer based on a community-driven repository
Integrated Task manager for Wine processes
Access to ProtonDB and WineHQ for support
System for bringing your configuration to new versions of Bottles
Back up and import bottles
Import Wine prefixes from other managers
Bottles versioning
... and much more that you can find by installing Bottles!

Verzioniranje butelja Äuva tvoj rad te omoguÄ‡uje obnavljanje odreÄ‘enog stanja butelje!

description.p: Jalankan perangkat lunak Windows di Linux menggunakan Bottles!
Perangkat lunak Bottle dan nikmati di waktu luang Anda!

Sistem instalasi dependensi bawaan kami memungkinkan akses kompatibilitas perangkat lunak yang luas. Kami juga menyertakan manajer unduhan untuk mengunduh komponen resmi: runner (Wine, Proton), DXVK, dependensi, dll.
Pembuatan versi bottle menjaga pekerjaan Anda tetap aman dan memungkinkan Anda memulihkannya nanti!
Fitur-fitur:

ul.li: Buat botol menggunakan lingkungan yang telah dikonfigurasi sebelumnya atau buat sendiri
Jalankan eksekusi (.exe/.msi) di bottle Anda, langsung dari menu konteks pengelola berkas Anda
Deteksi otomatis aplikasi yang dipasang dalam bottles Anda
Simpan variabel lingkungan dengan cepat
Ganti DLL langsung dari preferensi per bottle
Perubahan runner on-the-fly untuk Bottle apa pun
Berbagai pengoptimalan kinerja permainan (esync, fsync, DXVK, singgahan, kompilasi shader, offload ... dan banyak lagi.)
Instalasi otomatis dan manajemen runner Wine dan Proton
Perbaikan bottle otomatis jika terjadi kerusakan
Pemasang dependensi terintegrasi berdasarkan repositori berbasis komunitas
Manajer tugas terintegrasi untuk proses Wine
Akses ke ProtonDB dan WineHQ untuk dukungan
Sistem untuk membawa konfigurasi Anda ke versi baru Bottles
Cadangkan dan impor bottles
Impor Wine prefix dari manajer lain
... dan banyak lagi yang dapat Anda temukan dengan memasang Bottles!

description.p: Esegui software Windows su Linux con Bottles!
Divertiti a tuo piacimento con Bottles!

Il nostro sistema di installazione delle dipendenze integrato consente un facile accesso a un ampio livello di compatibilitÃ software. Includiamo anche un download manager per scaricare i componenti ufficiali: runner (wine, proton), dxvk, dipendenze, ecc.
FunzionalitÃ come il controllo delle versioni delle bottiglie ti consentono di mantenere il tuo lavoro al sicuro e ripristinarlo in seguito!
FunzionalitÃ :

ul.li: Crea le tue bottiglie utilizzando ambienti preconfigurati o creane uno tuo
Esegui ogni eseguibile (.exe / .msi) nelle tue bottiglie, direttamente dal menu contestuale dal tuo file manager
Rilevamento automatico delle applicazioni installate nelle tue bottiglie
Aggiungi variabili d'ambiente facilmente
Sostituisci le DLL direttamente dalle preferenze della bottiglia
Cambia runner al volo per qualsiasi bottiglia
Varie ottimizzazioni per prestazioni di gioco migliori (esync, fsync, dxvk, cache, shader compiler, offloadâ€¦ e molto altro).
Gestione e installazione automatica dei runner Wine e Proton
Ripara automaticamente le bottiglie se si rompono
Sistema di installazione dipendenze integrato, basato su una repository gestita dalla community
Gestore processi Wine integrato
Facile accesso a ProtonDB e WineHQ per il supporto
Sistema di aggiornamento dei file di configurazione fra versioni di Bottles
Esporta ed importa le bottiglie
Importa facilmente wineprefix da altri gestori
... e molto altro che puoi trovare installando Bottles!

description.p: Jalankan perisian Windows pada Linux Dengan Botol!
Botolkan perisian dan nikmatilah!

Sistem pemasangan pengantungan terbina dalam kami memberi akses automatik keserasian perisian. Gunakan pengurus muat turun untuk memuat turun komponen rasmi: Pelari (Wine, Proton), DXVK, pengantungan, dan lain-lain.
Pembuatan versi Botol menyimpan kerja anda selamat sekarang dan membolehkan anda mengembalikannya di masa hadapan!
Kelebihan:

ul.li: Cipta botol dengan mengunakan persekitaran yang telah dikonfigurasi atau ciptanya sendiri
Jalankan perisian (.exe/.msi) di dalam botol anda, secara langsung daripada menu konteks file-manager anda
Aplikasi dikesanan secara automatik di dalam botol anda
Adakan pembolehubah persekitaran dengan cepat
Atasi DLL secara langsung dari setiap pilihan botol
Tukar pelari secara on-the-fly untuk mana-mana botol
Pelbagai pengoptimuman performance gaming (esync, fsync, DXKV, cache, shader compiler, offload ... dan banyak lagi.)
Pemasangan automatik dan pengurusan untuk pelari Wine dan Proton
Penyelenggaraan automatik botol jika rosak
Pemasang pengantungan terbina dalam berasaskan repositori dorongan komuniti
Pengurus tugas terbina dalam untuk proses-proses Wine
Akses kepada ProtonDB dan WIneHQ untuk pertolongan
Sistem untuk membawa konfigurasi anda kepada versi terbaharu Botol
Sandarkan atau import botol
Import awalan Wine dari pengurus Wine yang lain
... dan banyak lagi yang anda boleh tahu daripada memasang Botol!

description.p: Tapp programvare pÃ¥ flaske og nyt som det passer deg.

VÃ¥rt innebygde installasjonssystem tillater enkel tilgang vidtfavnende programvarekompabilitet. En nedlastingsbehandler er ogsÃ¥ inkludert, for nedlasting av de offisielle komponentene: springeren (Wine, Proton), DXVK, avhengigheter, osv.
Flaskeversjonering holder arbeidet ditt trygt nÃ¥ og lar deg gjenopprette det senere!
Funksjoner:

ul.li: KjÃ¸r kjÃ¸rbare filer (.exe/.msi) i flaskene dine, direkte fra kontekstmenyen til filbehandleren

description.p: News

ul.li: Support for Steam runtimes (soldier, scout); if enabled, bottles with Proton use soldier while other runners use scout
Create Steam shortcuts directly from the program list; requires permission to the Steam path if Flatpak
Support for launching programs using xdg-open (e.g. xdg-open bottles:run/BottleName/ProgramName)
Library now show icons for all programs
Launch Bottles with a pre-selected bottle using the -b argument
Wine-GE runners are now grouped in the preferences
Improved logs readability
Disabled unsupported features for Steam Proton prefixes
Support for Nouveau drivers
Components installation now show a feedback during effective installation
Icon extraction now support external drives
Control WineProgram now support .cpl files
New WineProgram(s) Regsvr32, Eject, Expand, Explorer, Hh, Icinfo, Notepad, Oleview, Progman, Winhelp, Xcopy
Extended Msiexec WineProgram support with repair, uninstall, apply/uninstall patch, register/unregister module
The bottles list is now divided in categories (Bottles and Steam Proton prefixes)
General UI improvements

description.p: Fixes

ul.li: Fixed a bug which was preventing batch scripts from being executed via CLI
Fixed a bug during bottle creation which was raising an error when the recipe was empty
Fixed a bug in the journal which was causing a crash when the journal file was corrupted
Fixed a regression in sync change, the wine server was not being shut down properly
Fixed a bug in bottle preferences that caused a configuration update during widgets load
Fixed a bug which was preventing icoextract from working properly
Fixed a bug with desktop entries, were not being created if path contained apostrophes
Fixed a bug in setting the current working directory, it was being set even if it didn't exist
Fixed a bug in downloads, was causing a crash when the connection was closed by the server
Fixed a bug that sometimes caused a crash when offline
Fixed a bug with the Executor, it tried to execute even if the executable path was empty
Fixed a bug with Steam Proton prefixes support, was causing a crash if no prefixes were found
